text:
Jobr jobrapp.com | San Fancisco, Ca | Full Time or internship | Onsite

Hiring frontend and backend developers (Go Lang/ iOS/ Android).

We’re looking for a hungry, analytical Software Engineer to help us continue to move quickly and scale engineering operations. Some of the technologies we’re currently using are: Go (golang) for our API and Swift for our iOS App.

http://techcrunch.com/2014/07/17/jobr-2m/

Contact karson [at] jobrapp.com
